scripts.build: echo 'window.firebaseConfig = { apiKey: "$FIREBASE_API_KEY", authDomain: "$FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN", projectId: "$FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID", storageBucket: "$FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET", messagingSenderId: "$FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID", appId: "$FIREBASE_APP_ID", measurementId: "$MEASUREMENT_ID" };' > Frontend/config.js
